question: Which country houses the "Mercantour National Park"?
explanation: Mercantour National Park is an IUCN Category II national park located in France, created in 1979. It is an important popular tourist destination in France. This national park houses the "Valley of Marvels" which is a historical monument located in the heart of this park. Also, Mont Bego, which contains some 37000 petroglyphs dating back to Bronze Age.
